00058 /*===========================================================================*\
00059  *      The internal hash table structure is implementation
00060  *      specific. In this implementation, a straight-forward hash table is
00061  *      implemented as a hash table.
00062  *
00063 \*===========================================================================*/
00064 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00065 #include <config.h>
00066 #include <stdio.h>
00067 #include <stdlib.h>
00068 #include <malloc.h>
00069 #include <library/hash.h>
00070 
00071 #define MAX     100             /* at most 100 symbol tables */
00072 
00073 typedef struct _Tbl
00074 {
00075   Entry array;                  /* hash entry array */
00076   int size;                     /* table size */
00077 }
00078 _Tbl, *Tbl;
00079 
00080 static _Tbl TBL[MAX];           /* hash tables */
00081 static int next_tbl = 0;        /* next hash table */
00082 
00083 /* print error message and punt. */
00084 static void
00085 error (char *mesg)
00086 {
00087   fprintf (stderr, "hash table error : %s\n", mesg);
00088   exit (-1);
00089 }
00090 
00091 /* Compute the hash address. Return a number between 0 and size. 
00092  * Hash either the symbol is found, or when an INVALID_ENTRY
00093  * is found.
00094  */
00095 static int
00096 Hash (Tbl tbl, int key, int type)
00097                 /* hash table */
00098                 /* hash key */
00099                 /* entry type */
00100 {
00101   Entry table;
00102   register int hash_size, hash_pos, increment, trial;
00103   /* Quadratic probing */
00104   /* 1: initialize hash table parameters */
00105   table = tbl->array;
00106   hash_size = tbl->size;
00107   /* 2: compute initial hash position */
00108   hash_pos = key % hash_size;
00109   /* 3: iterate until exit condition is met */
00110   increment = 1;
00111   for (trial = 0; trial < hash_size; trial++)
00112     {
00113       /* 4: test if there is a hit */
00114       if ((table[hash_pos].type == type) && (table[hash_pos].key == key))
00115         {
00116           return hash_pos;
00117         }
00118       else
00119         /* 5: test if there is a miss */
00120       if (table[hash_pos].type == INVALID_ENTRY)
00121         {
00122           return hash_pos;
00123         }
00124       /* 6: else rehash */
00125       hash_pos = (hash_pos + increment) % hash_size;
00126       increment++;
00127     }
00128   /* went into a recursive loop, apparently the table
00129    * is not designed correctly.
00130    */
00131   fprintf (stderr, "# hash table size = %d\n", hash_size);
00132   fprintf (stderr, "# number of trials = %d\n", trial);
00133   error ("hash: too many hash steps");
00134   return -1;
00135 }
00137 int
00138 NewHashTbl (int max_size)
00139 {
00140   int new_id, i;
00141   Tbl T;
00143   new_id = next_tbl++;
00144   if (new_id >= MAX)
00145     {
00146       error ("hash: run out of hash tables");
00147       return -1;
00148     }
00149   T = TBL + new_id;
00150   T->size = max_size;
00151   T->array = (Entry) malloc (sizeof (_Entry) * T->size);
00152   if (T->array == 0)
00153     {
00154       error ("hash: failed to allocate hash table array");
00155       return -1;
00156     }
00157   for (i = 0; i < T->size; i++)
00158     {
00159       T->array[i].key = 0;
00160       T->array[i].type = INVALID_ENTRY;
00161       T->array[i].value = 0;
00162       T->array[i].ptr = 0;
00163     }
00164   return new_id;
00165 }
00167 Entry AddEntry (int tbl_id, int key, int type)
00168 {
00169   int index;
00170   Tbl tbl = TBL + tbl_id;
00171   Entry sym;
00172   if ((tbl_id < 0) || (tbl_id > next_tbl))
00173     error ("hash: in AddHash: illegal tbl_id");
00174   if (type == INVALID_ENTRY)
00175     error ("hash: in AddHash: illegal type");
00176   index = Hash (tbl, key, type);
00177   sym = tbl->array + index;
00178   /* create a new symbol if necessary */
00179   if (sym->type == INVALID_ENTRY)
00180     {
00181       sym->key = key;
00182       sym->type = type;
00183       sym->value = 0;
00184       sym->ptr = 0;
00185     }
00186   return sym;
00187 }
00189 Entry FindEntry (int tbl_id, int key, int type)
00190 {
00191   int index;
00192   Tbl tbl = TBL + tbl_id;
00193   Entry sym;
00194   if ((tbl_id < 0) || (tbl_id > next_tbl))
00195     error ("hash: in FindHash: illegal tbl_id");
00196   if (type == INVALID_ENTRY)
00197     error ("hash: in FindHash: illegal type");
00198   index = Hash (tbl, key, type);
00199   sym = tbl->array + index;
00200   /* if not found, return 0 */
00201   if (sym->type == INVALID_ENTRY)
00202     return 0;
00203   else
00204     return sym;
00205 }
00207 void
00208 ClearHashTbl (int tbl_id)
00209 {
00210   int i;
00211   Tbl tbl = TBL + tbl_id;
00212   if ((tbl_id < 0) || (tbl_id > next_tbl))
00213     error ("hash: in ClearHashTbl: illegal tbl_id");
00214   for (i = 0; i < tbl->size; i++)
00215     {
00216       tbl->array[i].key = 0;
00217       tbl->array[i].type = INVALID_ENTRY;
00218       tbl->array[i].value = 0;
00219       tbl->array[i].ptr = 0;
00220     }
00221 }
00222 
00223 #ifdef DEBUG_HASH
00224 void
00225 pr (Entry sym)
00226 {
00227   if (sym == 0)
00228     fprintf (stderr, "()\n");
00229   else
00230     fprintf (stderr, "(key=%d, type=%d, value=%d, ptr=%d)\n",
00231              sym->key, sym->type, sym->value, sym->ptr);
00232 }
00233 void
00234 main ()
00235 {
00236   int aaa, bbb, ccc, ddd, eee, fff, ggg, hhh;
00237   int id, *XXX;
00238   char *YYY;
00239   void *ZZZ;
00240   struct
00241   {
00242     int a, b;
00243   }
00244    *AAA;
00245   Entry s;
00246   fprintf (stderr, "#####\n");
00247   id = NewHashTbl (8);
00248   aaa = 1;
00249   bbb = 2;
00250   ccc = 3;
00251   ddd = 4;
00252   eee = 5;
00253   fff = 6;
00254   ggg = 7;
00255   hhh = 8;
00256   s = AddEntry (id, aaa, 1);
00257   pr (s);
00258   s = FindEntry (id, aaa, 2);
00259   pr (s);
00260   s = AddEntry (id, bbb, 2);
00261   pr (s);
00262   s = FindEntry (id, bbb, 2);
00263   pr (s);
00264   s = AddEntry (id, ccc, 2);
00265   pr (s);
00266   s = AddEntry (id, ddd, 2);
00267   pr (s);
00268   s->ptr = XXX;
00269   s = AddEntry (id, ddd, 2);
00270   pr (s);
00271   s = AddEntry (id, eee, 2);
00272   pr (s);
00273   s = FindEntry (id, eee, 1);
00274   pr (s);
00275   s = AddEntry (id, fff, 2);
00276   pr (s);
00277   s->ptr = YYY;
00278   s = AddEntry (id, fff, 2);
00279   pr (s);
00280   s->ptr = ZZZ;
00281   s = AddEntry (id, fff, 2);
00282   pr (s);
00283   s->ptr = AAA;
00284   s = FindEntry (id, fff, 2);
00285   pr (s);
00286   s = AddEntry (id, ggg, 2);
00287   pr (s);
00288   s = AddEntry (id, hhh, 2);
00289   pr (s);
00290   fprintf (stderr, "#####\n");
00291 }
00292 #endif
